attributes.additional_details:
We want new laws put in place to pretect our wildlife all animals  and there land.
Also id like to see a change in the way shops can just sell animals without doing home checks.
Id like to see a clamp down all pet trading in the uk and humans given more rights to have there say about how our wildlife is treated.
Id also like stronger powers given to the rspca to act on a report of abuse right away.
There s to much land being stolen for our needs and its going to wipe our wildlife out.
Pretect all woldlife or our kids will soon see nothing but photos in books.

Id like wildlife parks set up to attract more wildlife to.

If you care about our country you will end the greed.
Id also like a total ban on hunting
